  • Constructor Details

    • Loan

      public Loan(Patron patron, Book book, LocalDate startDate, LocalDate dueDate)
      Create a new Loan instance.
      The constructor initialises a new Book instance using all the mandatory fields of the class.
      Parameters:
      patron - - the patron that borrowed the book.
      book - - the book that is on loan.
      startDate - - the start date of the loan as LocalDate.
      dueDate - - the due date of the loan as LocalDate.

  • Method Details

    • getPatron

      public Patron getPatron()
      Get the loan's patron object.
      Returns:
      the loan's patron.

    • setPatron

      public void setPatron(Patron patron)
      Set the loan's patron object.
      Parameters:
      patron - - the Patron object that will be set as the loan's patron

    • getBook

      public Book getBook()
      Get the loan's book object.
      Returns:
      the loan's book.

    • setBook

      public void setBook(Book book)
      Set the loan's book object.
      Parameters:
      book - - the Book object that will be set as the loan's book.

    • getStartDate

      public LocalDate getStartDate()
      Get the loan's start date.
      Returns:
      the loan's start date as LocalDate

    • setStartDate

      public void setStartDate(LocalDate startDate)
      Set the loan's start date.
      Parameters:
      startDate - - the LocalDate value that will be set as the loan's start date

    • getDueDate

      public LocalDate getDueDate()
      Get the loan's due date.
      Returns:
      the loan's due date as LocalDate

    • setDueDate

      public void setDueDate(LocalDate dueDate)
      Set the loan's due date.
      Parameters:
      dueDate - - the LocalDate value that will be set as the loan's due date

    • getTerminationStatus

      public boolean getTerminationStatus()
      Get the loan's termination status.
      Returns:
      returns true if the loan has been terminated and otherwise, returns false.

    • setTerminationStatus

      public void setTerminationStatus(boolean isTerminated)
      Set the loan's termination status.
      Parameters:
      isTerminated - - true to terminate the loan and false to undo the changes.

    • getReturnDate

      public LocalDate getReturnDate()
      Get the loan's return date.
      Returns:
      the loan's return date as LocalDate.

    • setReturnDate

      public void setReturnDate(LocalDate returnDate)
      Set the loan's return date.
      Parameters:
      returnDate - - the LocalDate value that will be set as the loan's return date.

    • terminateLoan

      public void terminateLoan()
      Terminate the loan.
      The method changes isTerminated to true and sets to return date to the current date.

    • unTerminateLoan

      public void unTerminateLoan()
      Undo loan termination.
      The method changes isTerminated to false and sets to return date to a null object.
      The method is used to roll back changes in case the program is not able to store the changes in the text storage files.
